plugin.name: Comments
list.header.title: Comments
list.header.description: {count, plural, =0 {All available} one {# new comment} other {# new comments}}
list.content.empty: Nothing found, lift your search criteria and try again
list.item.header.blocked.thread: This comment and thread have been blocked
list.item.threads.count: {count, plural, =0 {There is no threads} one {# thread} other {# threads}}
list.item.header.abuse: {count, plural, =0 {Nothing reported} one {# report waits for review} other {# reports waits for review}}
moderation.header.title: Moderation
moderation.content.empty: Choose a comment to start moderating
notification.thread.visibility: Comment thread visibility has been changed
